meanings.definition: Convert (a message or piece of text) into a coded form by using a cipher.
meanings.sent1: I will encipher the secret message to keep it safe.
meanings.sent2: She learned how to encipher her diary entries to protect her privacy.
meanings.sent3: The spy tried to encipher his grocery list, thinking it was a top-secret document.
meanings.sent4: Her smile seemed to encipher a hidden message of joy and excitement.
meanings.sent5: The magician's wand seemed to encipher the air with a sense of mystery.
